settings.title: Settings
settings.description: Manage your preferences for language and notifications.
settings.toast.default_error_try_again: An error occurred while processing your request. Try again later.
settings.error.generic_processing: An error occurred while processing your request.
profile.label.name: Name
dashboard.header_description: Historical exchange rates data provided by the National Bank of Ukraine. Select a currency and date range to view the exchange rate dynamics.
dashboard.no_data_available: No data available for the selected currency and date range.
dashboard.toast.no_currency_selected_for: No currency selected or available for the current date range.
dashboard.toast.select_currency_to_pin: Please select a currency to pin.
dashboard.chart_footer_text: Chart shows exchange rates against Ukrainian Hryvnia (UAH). Data is updated daily on business days.
currencydetails.nodata.title: No Data Available
currencydetails.nodata.description: Detailed analytics for the selected currency and date range could not be found. This might be due to no exchange rate data being available for this period, or the currency code being invalid.
currencydetails.chart.no_data: No rate data available to display chart.
currencydetails.chart.footer_format: Chart displays the exchange rate of {0} against UAH.
currencydetails.toast.chart_display_erro: Could not display the currency trend chart.
currencydetails.toast.load_rate_trend_er: Could not load rate trend data for {0}.
contacts.header.title: Report an Issue
contacts.header.description: Please provide details about the issue you are experiencing. Your feedback is important to us.
contacts.form.label.title: Title
contacts.form.placeholder.title: Brief title of the issue
contacts.toast.report_sent_successfully: Report sent successfully! We will review it shortly.
contacts.toast.file_too_large_format: File '{0}' exceeds the maximum allowed size of {1}.
contacts.toast.invalid_file_extension_fo: File '{0}' has an invalid extension. Allowed extensions are: {1}.
contacts.error.response_null: An error occurred. The server response was empty.
currencycomparison.summary.title: Comparison Summary
currencycomparison.nodata_instruction: Select two different currencies and a date range, then click "Compare Currencies" to see the analysis.
currencycomparison.stats.no_moving_avera: No moving average data available for this period.
currencycomparison.toast.select_two_curr: Please select two currencies to compare.
currencycomparison.toast.no_data_found: No comparison data found for the selected criteria.
forecast.header.title: Currency Forecast
forecast.header.description: Select a currency and forecast period to generate a rate forecast using our AI model. The forecast will update automatically upon selection.
forecast.disclaimer.text: The forecast data presented is generated by an AI model and should be considered an estimate. This chart illustrates potential trends and is not a guarantee of future currency rates. Please use this information cautiously and do not rely on it solely for financial decisions.
forecast.chart.no_data: No forecast data to display. Select a currency and period to generate a forecast.
forecast.toast.invalid_period: Forecast periods must be greater than zero.
